author: ryan
msg: SOLR-133 -- found a bug in the delete XML parsing.  for id's and queries with &, it did not behave correctly.  Adds a fix and test.  Another sideeffect that should be noted is that this parser now accepts multiple delete commands:

author: niallp
msg: BEANUTILS-247 - Support Arrays with multiple dimension

author: niallp
msg: BEANUTILS-285 and BEANUTILS-258 - provide new BeanUtilsBean / ConvertUtilsBean implementations that take full advantage of the new Converter implementations - default behaviour is compatible with BeanUtils 1.7.0. These new implementations are configured by calling BeanUtilsBean.setInstance(new BeanUtilsBean2);
